name: Chow Central Inc
headline: Asset Light Chipotle for Africa
description:
Founded in October 2022, Chow Central is building technology to disrupt the food industry in Nigeria. The goal is to profitably provide food to as many people as possible in record time. 

Chow Central has launched its first product "500chow". A delivery-only quick service restaurant that serves customers in record time. 500chow has 10x lower costs than traditional brick-and-mortar restaurants, and 10x more online orders. 

Our customers love us for our super fast and cheaper deliveries. We are able to do this by launching hyper-locally within a 3km radius.

We are very focused on solving real problems in the food industry one scalable product at a time.

founders.name: Adeyemi Onafuye, Founder
founders.description: Chief Product Officer at Chow Central. I have 8 years of experience in technology and management consulting. I have worked extensively in the tech startup ecosystem in Nigeria. I am a member of the World Economic Forum’s Global Shapers Community.

generated_description:
**Chow Central Inc: Transforming Food Delivery in Nigeria**

Founded in October 2022 and backed by Y Combinator’s Batch S23, Chow Central Inc is on a mission to revolutionize the food scene in Africa, aiming to be the "Asset Light Chipotle" for the continent. With its headquarters in Lagos, Nigeria, Chow Central is focused on using technology to provide efficient and affordable food options to as many people as possible, prioritizing speed and cost-effectiveness.

One of their standout offerings, "500chow", is a delivery-only quick-service restaurant model that slices through traditional restaurant costs, boasting expenses that are ten times lower than conventional establishments. This innovative approach allows for an astonishing tenfold increase in online orders. By operating hyper-locally within a 3km radius from its delivery hubs, Chow Central achieves extraordinarily quick delivery times—attributes that customers rave about.

The company’s mantra is simple yet effective: solve real problems in the food industry, one scalable product at a time. They not only focus on delivery speed but also maintain a strong reputation for affordability and quality, as reflected in glowing customer feedback. Users praise the taste of meals—especially the renowned jollof rice—and the generous portion sizes, which contribute to a compelling value proposition.

Chow Central operates with a small but dynamic team, allowing for agile decisions and rapid product innovation. With a clear vision, notable backing, and an impressive concept, Chow Central is poised to disrupt the Nigerian food landscape and potentially the broader African market.

For more insights or to order delicious food straight to your door, check out their website at [Chow Central](https://chowcentral.com).
